name: Darren Weng
profile: Penn CS  Experienced in open source, hackathons, and STEM education. Seeking to create solutions that benefit all through open debate and technology.

education.title: Yale Young Global Scholar (IST)
education.description: Innovations in Science & Technology. Attended seminars on AI, neuroscience, and cognitive science.

education.title: Johns Hopkins University Summer
education.description: Applications of Chemistry in Medicine (A), Neuroscience and Human Behavior (A+) (college credits)

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Tasked with employing AI to develop a customer service agent.

experience.title: Academic Journal Committee Member
experience.description: Built data pipelines and applied statistical and machine learning methods to investigate economic and financial questions for publication. Developed Python tools to extract and analyze earnings data, call sentiment (using FinBERT), and stock price reactions across S&P 500 firms, exploring the relationship between EPS surprises, sentiment, and market impact.

experience.title: Software Intern
experience.description: Mapped internal bond records to Artemis deal directory for traders use using fuzzy logic and web-scraping using C# and SQL. Implemented a new data validation system used by real-time trade analysis and monitoring reports.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Non-profit targeting accessibility in healthcare. Use chatbots, open-source projects & crowdfunding to address social issues. Maintain 4 and sponsor 7 open source projects through members' donations.

experience.title: Summer Tech Intern
experience.description: Wrote 11 Selenium scripts to automate QA. Created prototype client support chatbot trained with Salesforce data.

experience.title: Instructor
experience.description: Paid job teaching STEM & Design Thinking to 200+ kids. Employee of the year 2022.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Invited to join CVT intern team. Learned data analysis and visualization tools.

projects.title: Financial Data Analysis Pipeline
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive data pipeline for analyzing S&P 500 earnings calls and market reactions. Implemented sentiment analysis using FinBERT and correlation studies between EPS surprises and stock price movements.

projects.title: Healthcare Accessibility Platform
projects.description: Co-founded Last Mile Now, a non-profit platform connecting healthcare resources with underserved communities. Implemented chatbot solutions and open-source tools to improve healthcare accessibility.

projects.title: Automated QA Testing Suite
projects.description: Created an automated testing framework using Selenium to improve QA efficiency. Reduced testing time by 70% and increased test coverage.

projects.title: COVID-19 Data Visualization
projects.description: Contributed to Harvard's Coronavirus Visualization Team, creating interactive visualizations to track and analyze pandemic data.
